RICHMOND, Texas Fort Bend County received nearly 12,000 Pfizer vaccine doses, Judge KP George said in a press conference Tuesday.

articles.title: Clyburn targets OSHA, meatpacking companies with investigation of COVID-19 outbreaks - USA TODAY
articles.description: Clyburn criticized OSHA for failing “to adequately carry out its responsibility for enforcing worker safety laws,” resulting in infections and death.
articles.content:
